iti24:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti24:2.1: “Mendicants, one person roaming and transmigrating for an eon would amass a heap of bones the size of this Mount Vepulla, if they were gathered together and not lost.”
iti24:3.1: “If the bones of a single person
iti24:3.2: for a single eon were gathered up,
iti24:3.3: they’d make a pile the size of a mountain:
iti24:4.1: And this is declared to be
iti24:4.4: near the Mountainfold of the Magadhans.
iti24:5.2: a person sees the noble truths—
iti24:5.6: that leads to the stilling of suffering.
iti24:6.1: After roaming on seven times at most,
iti24:6.4: with the ending of all fetters.”
iti24:7.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
